data.title: Ivan Aguilar Duclaud on LinkedIn: I met Nayera Korraa in 2020. We were both starting new jobs at SAP and…
data.meta_description: I met Nayera Korraa in 2020. We were both starting new jobs at SAP and learning about the pandemic's implications. Nayera was part of the first global team…
data.text:
I am incredibly grateful for my first week at the SAP Academy for Customer Success in San Ramon, California, after spending an intense 5 months in virtual engagements. Here are 3 main takeaways that I’d like to share: 1️⃣ Teamwork 🙌 : Having participated in a myriad of team activities, I have been reminded of the power of collaboration and the importance of every individual's contribution. We have been able to bring together diverse ideas to establish creative solutions. 2️⃣ In-person Training 🧠: Being able to physically participate in the sessions reaffirmed the value of face-to-face training. The dynamic exchange of knowledge, the immediate Q&A and the real-time feedback have greatly enhanced my learning experience. 3️⃣ Networking 👥: While online sessions establish connections, nothing beats the networking capacity and community building of in-person interactions. Meeting professionals from various market units and cultures and sharing experiences has broadened my understanding of this globalized business. I am excited for the journey ahead and can't wait to contribute my best to SAP and our esteemed customers. Shout-out to the amazing people I have met this week. Here is to continuous growth and incessant learning! #SAPAcademy #CustomerSuccess #In-personLearning #Networking #Teamwork #ContinuousLearning #SiliconValley

🌟 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫 𝐨𝐟 𝐊𝐧𝐨𝐰𝐥𝐞𝐝𝐠𝐞 𝐒𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠: 𝐀 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐉𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐧𝐞𝐲 🌟 Six years ago, when I just started my journey with SAP, I was lucky to have the opportunity to meet great mentors and colleagues who had a huge wealth of knowledge and support. They patiently explained the basics 📝, guided me through complex processes 🔄, and helped me to find my place in a new and challenging environment 🌍. Their willingness to share their knowledge played a crucial role in my professional growth 🌱💡. Today, I'm thrilled to reach a full circle moment 🎉. I had the privilege of hosting my first enablement session 🎤, where I shared insights about the sales process with examples from my personal sales journey 🚀. It was a moment of great honor and gratitude 🙏, reflecting on how far I have come and how knowledge sharing has been one of the keystones of that growth 📈✨. A huge thank you to 𝐃𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐚𝐧𝐚 𝐊𝐮ž𝐞𝐭 for inviting me to be a speaker 🎙️ and for providing me with the opportunity to give back to the community that has given me so much 🤗. Knowledge sharing is not just about transferring information 📚 - it is about building a supportive community 🤝, increasing growth 🌱, and empowering each other to achieve our best 🌟. Let's continue to learn, grow, and share together! 🚀 Felix Becker Dragana Kužet #CBS #CustomerBusinessSupport #EMEA #EMEAS #KnowledgeSharing #SAP #SalesProcess #GrowthJourney #EnablementSession

100--🌟 Celebrating Century of SAP Mentorship 🌟 What a journey it has been! In just four months, we've hit a milestone - helping 100 aspiring SAP professionals navigate the complex world of SAP. 🚀 These dedicated mentees embarked on their SAP journeys, and I had the privilege of guiding them towards a deeper understanding of this remarkable field. 𝑻𝒉𝒆 𝒃𝒆𝒔𝒕 𝒑𝒂𝒓𝒕? Most of them aced interviews and are now part of renowned MNCs, paving their paths to success. 𝑩𝒖𝒕 𝒉𝒆𝒓𝒆'𝒔 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒌𝒊𝒄𝒌𝒆𝒓 - this journey wasn't just about me sharing knowledge. It was also about learning and growing together. My mentees shared their unique experiences, challenges, and insights, enriching my understanding of SAP. Thank you to Ankit Agarwal for the platform, topmate.io, which has been instrumental in connecting SAP enthusiasts, fostering a sense of community, and offering a collective understanding of the evolving SAP landscape. Today, I'm elated to be part of the exclusive 1% SAP mentor club, a recognition I wear with pride. The glorious tick mark affirms my identity as a trusted SAP consultant and the love that Linkedin Community has showered with their response and engagement. Here's to the mentees who've become future SAP leaders and to the knowledge shared that fuels our collective growth. 🌐 If you're on the SAP journey or need guidance, don't hesitate to reach out. Don't forget to checkout the lovely Testimonies. Let's continue shaping the future of SAP together! 🤝 #SAPMentorship #Mentorship #SAPJourney #Topmate #SAPCommunity

🚀 𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐡 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐒𝐀𝐏 𝐀𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐚 ——importance of Soft SKILLS——————- 1. 📚 𝑺𝒕𝒂𝒚 𝑨𝒉𝒆𝒂𝒅 𝒐𝒇 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝑪𝒖𝒓𝒗𝒆 👉 SAP is a dynamic world that's always evolving. 👉 Stay not just up-to-date but two steps ahead. 👉 Immerse yourself in conferences, webinars, and certifications. 👉 Your skillset is a living, breathing entity - nurture it! 2. 🔍 𝑩𝒆𝒄𝒐𝒎𝒆 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝑮𝒐-𝑻𝒐 𝑬𝒙𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒕 🤙 Amidst a sea of SAP professionals, how do you stand out? 🤙 Specialize! Whether it's SAP Fiori, BW/4HANA, or any niche, be THE expert. 🤙 Let your name be the first to pop up when someone seeks SAP wisdom. 3. 🌐 𝑵𝒆𝒕𝒘𝒐𝒓𝒌 𝑳𝒊𝒌𝒆 𝒂 𝑷𝒓𝒐--Follow Avnikant Singh 🇮🇳 🤜 It's not just about what you know, but who you know. 🤜 In the SAP world, it's both. 🤜 Build connections that matter. 🤜 Every handshake, virtual or real, is a potential door to new opportunities. 4. 🌍 𝑪𝒓𝒐𝒔𝒔 𝑩𝒐𝒓𝒅𝒆𝒓𝒔, 𝑬𝒙𝒑𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝑯𝒐𝒓𝒊𝒛𝒐𝒏𝒔 💢 SAP speaks a global language. 💢 Speak it with different accents. 💢 Work on international projects, adapt to new cultures. 💢 Be a versatile player in the global game. 5. 🌟 𝑺𝒉𝒐𝒘𝒄𝒂𝒔𝒆 𝒀𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝑺𝒖𝒄𝒄𝒆𝒔𝒔𝒆𝒔 🌿 Your achievements are your best advocates. 🌿 Did you enhance efficiency? Cut costs? Transform processes? 🌿 Tell those stories. Make your LinkedIn a testament to your SAP prowess. 6. 🤝 𝑯𝒐𝒏𝒆 𝒀𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝑺𝒐𝒇𝒕 𝑺𝒌𝒊𝒍𝒍𝒔 ✅ In the tech, being human is your superpower. ✅ Empathy, leadership, communication - skills robots can't replicate. ✅ Be the SAP professional who brings more than just technical expertise. ✅ SAP champions, are you ready to elevate your game? Let's make this year 2024 the one where you become invaluable in your SAP journey! ⚕ P.S. What's one skill or area you're keen to develop this year in your SAP career? Comment below! Thanks Alok Kumar-for this topic. 👉 Follow Avnikant Singh 🇮🇳 for these awesome SAP thoughts and learn SAP topics with simple yet Relatable terms .

𝗘𝗺𝗯𝗮𝗿𝗸 𝗼𝗻 𝗮 𝗝𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗻𝗲𝘆 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝘂𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗦𝗔𝗣 𝗚𝗹𝗼𝗯𝗮𝗹 𝗖𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 - 𝗘𝗺𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿𝘀𝗲𝗹𝗳 𝗧𝗼𝗱𝗮𝘆! Take charge of your career and unlock your true potential by investing in your skills and knowledge. Now, you have two incredible options to choose from: 𝟭. 𝗦𝗶𝗻𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗔𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗺𝗽𝘁 𝗖𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Achieve greatness in one shot with our Single Attempt option, available at an unbeatable price of just 𝗣𝗞𝗥 𝟯𝟓,𝟓𝟎𝟎. Showcase your abilities and prove your expertise without any compromises. 𝟮. 𝗦𝗶𝗻𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗔𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗺𝗽𝘁 𝗖𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗘𝘅𝗮𝗺 𝗣𝗿𝗲𝗽𝗮𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Supercharge your chances of success by opting for our Exam Preparation package, which combines the Single Attempt with comprehensive study resources and expert guidance. Don't miss this chance to join the league of industry trailblazers and stand out in a competitive market. 𝗙𝗼𝗿 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗹𝘀: +92 326 0436082 Muhammad Sameer Ali Message Muhammad Sameer Ali on WhatsApp. https://lnkd.in/dtqaxht4 𝐓𝐚𝐤𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐩. 𝐄𝐦𝐛𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐞𝐱𝐜𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞. 𝐄𝐧𝐫𝐨𝐥𝐥 𝐭𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲!

🌟 Taking a moment to reflect on my time at the SAP Academy in San Ramon, CA, it's clear this experience has been a catalyst for both professional and personal growth 🌱. Over four action-packed weeks, I've deepened my understanding 📚, expanded my network 👥, and even found some lifelong friends 🤝. A highlight was presenting a live demo to Mohamed Yusuf, the Global Head of Solution Advisory. His insights were a game-changer, reinforcing the true potential of what we do. Building on this, I enabled an outstanding team of associates in showcasing AI's transformative power to executives like Scott Russell, the Head of Customer Success. It's experiences like these that drive home the real-world impact of our work 🌍. Gratitude is due to my academy managers Fernando Sánchez Lara, Ivan Aguilar Duclaud, and Ruben Dario Acero 🙏. Their mentorship was my compass in this journey. A special nod to Mary Lange and Doug Robertson, whose commitment to the program set the gold standard for what professional development should be ✨. Amid this intensive training, I also co-hosted a talk with Mary Lange and Karina Montilla Edmonds on the pivotal role of women in the workforce 👩💼. A timely and enriching discussion that added another layer to an already multi-faceted experience. The true gem of this program? The people 🌟. Not only have I built a robust network spanning the entirety of SAP, but the spirit of collaboration among associates was genuinely uplifting. These relationships have evolved beyond just professional networks; I’m honored to call many my friends. As this intensive chapter closes, I'm energized for what’s next ⏩. From aligning solutions to driving innovation, the sky's the limit! Here's to a future full of impactful solutions and meaningful connections 🚀. #SAPAcademy #ProfessionalGrowth #Innovation #Teamwork #SolutionAdvisor #LifeAtSAP Philippe Nemery, PhD (he/him) | Hélène Dastugue | Frank Soudan | Bernard Kenny | Yasmine Abdallah | Godfrey Leung | David Uichanco | Jessica Zhang
